name: Endafun
about: EndaFun is a social media app that aims to enhance interactions between colleagues outside the office.
invlolvement: I played the role of frontend dev. The project was built using React.js, Material UI, Redux and TypeScript. For the backend Java Spring Boot was used.  I also got the opportunity to use Figma to create some of the app screens.

name: JDAC Capital
about: An innovation focused investment firm located in Singapore.
invlolvement: I developed the company website using Next.js, as part of a 3-member team consisting of a developer, designer, and business owner.

name: Endavibe
about: The app objective was to offer information and keep the business owners updated in due time about the health of the project and its members.
invlolvement: I developed the frontend part, in team with another colleague using React.js, Material UI and TypeScript. For the email templates we used HTML tables. We added Chart.Js for dashboard stats and reports.

name: IT School
about: IT School is one of the biggest IT course centres in Romania
invlolvement: I developed the company website using Next.js, as part of a 3-member team consisting of a developer, designer, and business owner.
